message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? This price reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This aligns better with my budget while still reflecting its value.
